title: Lakshmi Temple Kasu Earrings - Divine Radiance
materials: set with brilliant Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones and accented with synthetic Rubies. Features a signature Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster and deep color.
features: These stunning jhumkas showcase the traditional temple jewelry design, featuring a meticulously crafted Lakshmi figure at the center. The deity is surrounded by a halo of sparkling CZ stones, enhancing her divine presence. The intricate gold filigree work and traditional 'nakshi' carving on the Lakshmi idol are hallmarks of South Indian craftsmanship.
colors: Dominantly golden with a rich antique finish
accented by the vibrant red of the synthetic rubies and the sparkling white of the CZ stones. A timeless and auspicious color palette.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. A beautiful and meaningful gift for a bride or a loved one
especially during Seemantham or half-saree functions.
description: These earrings blend divine symbolism with exquisite craftsmanship. The Lakshmi motif signifies prosperity and good fortune, making these more than just jewelry - they are a blessing. The detailed nakshi work and the brilliant CZ stones highlight the artistry of our skilled artisans. A treasured heirloom to be passed down through generations.
